title: The Black Dress: Mary Mackillop's Early Years
description: The fictional story of Mary Mackillop's early years before she began her religious order.Can you love someone when you can’t forgive them? Do you keep fighting for something you believe in when everyone is telling you you’re wrong?The Black Dress is the incredible story of Mary MacKillop – an unconventional young woman born into a time and a religion bound by convention.What Mary did with her life would change the course of Australia’s history.
author: Pamela Freeman
